pullrequest.title: [A-7]Install worlds, and move gui.config to IGN_DATA_INSTALL_DIR

content.raw:
For some reason, the doxygen tags are landing in `/usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-gazebo_1/ignition-gazebo.tag.xml` even though this is version 0, not 1. Should they all be in the same directory?

Also, do we want the worlds to go in a versioned directory? The world files themselves have the `ign-gazebo` version hardcoded in them.
content.html:
For some reason, the doxygen tags are landing in /usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-gazebo_1/ignition-gazebo.tag.xml even though this is version 0, not 1. Should they all be in the same directory?

Also, do we want the worlds to go in a versioned directory? The world files themselves have the ign-gazebo version hardcoded in them.
